Compute individual contributions

Source: R/pca.R
pca_ind_contrib.Rd

Return indivdual contributions for each principal component

Usage

pca_ind_contrib(ind_coords, eigenvalues)

Arguments

ind_coords

individual coordinates

eigenvalues

eigenvalues

Examples

library(FactoMineR2)

X_active <- iris[, -5] |>
  standardize_norm()

eigs <- X_active |>
  get_eigen()

X_active |>
  pca_ind_coords(eigs$vectors) |>
  pca_ind_contrib(eigs$values) |>
  head()
#>          Dim.1      Dim.2       Dim.3       Dim.4
#> [1,] 1.1637691 0.16694510 0.073591567 0.018672867
#> [2,] 0.9825900 0.32925696 0.248367113 0.339198420
#> [3,] 1.2683043 0.08469576 0.008816151 0.025742863
#> [4,] 1.1996857 0.25856249 0.037605617 0.139067312
#> [5,] 1.2959338 0.30313118 0.001117674 0.041253702
#> [6,] 0.9775628 1.60670454 0.003281801 0.001396002
